item.title: Clarkson Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to ending of support by the upstream project, we have made the decision to deprecate our Clarkson image. The image will immediately cease to be supported and will not receive any further updates. Users of the image are advised to look at Hammond as a possible replacement.
item.content:
Due to ending of support by the upstream project, we have made the decision to deprecate our Clarkson image. The image will immediately cease to be supported and will not receive any further updates.

Users of the image are advised to look at Hammond as a possible replacement.

item.title: New Container: Clarkson
item.description: We have released a new container for Clarkson! Clarkson is a web-based dashboard application that gives you a neat and clean interface for logging your fuel fill-ups for all of your vehicles. The application has full multi-user support, as well as multiple vehicles per user. Whenever you fill-up your car or motorcycle, keep the receipt and record the data in Clarkson.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Clarkson!

Clarkson is a web-based dashboard application that gives you a neat and clean interface for logging your fuel fill-ups for all of your vehicles. The application has full multi-user support, as well as multiple vehicles per user. Whenever you fill-up your car or motorcycle, keep the receipt and record the data in Clarkson.
